content: tapestry needle rs right side and pass yarn end through live stitches remove sl m slip marker needles and sew in end st s stitch es ws wrong side wash using wool wash remove excess water from hat wyib with yarn held to back of work and block using a balloon to shape hat allow to dry wyif with yarn held to front of work thoroughly sew in ends wear and enjoy warm the line beanie - 1 rosemary romi hill did you know the white and yellow shading in the charts marks off squares in increments of 5 going from right to left key to chart symbols no stitch cdd k p did you know the charts used in this hat pattern are knit in the round so each round is a rs round and is worked from right to left chart a - work full chart 6 times chart a alternate written instructions 10 work 6 times 9 8 round 1 p2 k1 p5 k1 p3 9 times 7 6 round 2 and even numbered rounds 5 through 10 knit 4 3 round 3 p2 k1 p5 k1 p3 9 times 2 round 5 p1 k3 p4 k1 p3 9 times 1 round 7 k5 p3 k1 p3 9 times work 9 times per round round 9 p1 k3 p4 k1 p3 9 times chart b - work 1 time chart b alternate written instructions 8 work 1 time 7 6 5 round 1 p2 k1 p5 k1 p3 9 times 4 3 round 2 and even numbered rounds 2 through 8 knit 1 round 3 p1 cdd p3 cdd p2 9 work 9 times per round times round 5 cdd p1 18 times round 7 k1 cdd 9 times warm the line beanie - 2 rosemary romi hill
